title: Full stack developer C#
description:
At Capgemini Engineering, the world leader in engineering services, we bring together a global team of engineers, scientists, and architects to help the world‚Äôs most‚ÄØinnovative companies unleash their potential. From autonomous cars to life\\-saving robots, our digital and software technology experts think outside the box as they‚ÄØprovide unique R\\&D and engineering services across all industries. Join us for a career full of opportunities. Where you can make a difference. Where no two days are‚ÄØthe same.
   

  

**Job Description**
**Job Description:**
* Proficiency in problem solving and troubleshooting technical issues.
* Willingness to take ownership and strive for the best solutions.
* Experience in using performance analysis tools, such as Android Profiler, Traceview, perfetto, and Systrace etc.
* Strong understanding of Android architecture, memory management, and threading.
* Strong understanding of Android HAL‚Äôs, Car Framework, Android graphics pipeline, DRM, Codecs.
* Good knowledge in Hardware abstraction layers in Android and/or Linux.
* Good understanding of the git, CI/CD workflow
* Experience in agile based projects.
* Experience with Linux as a development platform and target
* Extensive experience with Jenkins and Gitlab CI system
* Hands\\-on experience with GitLab, Jenkins, Artifactory, Grafana, Prometheus and/or Elastic Search.
* Experience with different testing frameworks and their implementation in CI system
* Programming using C/C\\+\\+, Java/Kotlin, Linux.
* Yocto and its use in CI Environments
* Familiarity with ASPICE


 Works in the area of Software Engineering, which encompasses the development, maintenance and optimization of software solutions/applications.1\\. Applies scientific methods to analyse and solve software engineering problems.2\\. He/she is responsible for the development and application of software engineering practice and knowledge, in research, design, development and maintenance.3\\. His/her work requires the exercise of original thought and judgement and the ability to supervise the technical and administrative work of other software engineers.4\\. The software engineer builds skills and expertise of his/her software engineering discipline to reach standard software engineer skills expectations for the applicable role, as defined in Professional Communities.5\\. The software engineer collaborates and acts as team player with other software engineers and stakeholders.
   

  

**Job Description \\- Grade Specific**
 Is highly respected, experienced and trusted. Masters all phases of the software development lifecycle and applies innovation and industrialization. Shows a clear dedication and commitment to business objectives and responsibilities and to the group as a whole. Operates with no supervision in highly complex environments and takes responsibility for a substantial aspect of Capgemini√¢¬Ä¬ôs activity. Is able to manage difficult and complex situations calmly and professionally. Considers √¢¬Ä¬òthe bigger picture√¢¬Ä¬ô when making decisions and demonstrates a clear understanding of commercial and negotiating principles in less\\-easy situations. Focuses on developing long term partnerships with clients. Demonstrates leadership that balances business, technical and people objectives. Plays a significant part in the recruitment and development of people.
   

  

 Skills (competencies)
   

  

 Verbal Communication
   

  

 Capgemini is a global business and technology transformation partner, helping organizations to accelerate their dual transition to a digital and sustainable world, while creating tangible impact for enterprises and society. It is a responsible and diverse group of 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong over 55\\-year heritage, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to unlock the value of technology to address the entire breadth of their business needs. It delivers end\\-to\\-end services and solutions leveraging strengths from strategy and design to engineering, all fueled by its market leading capabilities in AI, generative AI, cloud and data, combined with its deep industry expertise and partner ecosystem.

title: Python Trainee
description:
**Company Description** 




 Springreen, founded in 2019, is a fast\\-growing leader in the Software Development and IT sectors. Specializing in innovative solutions such as blockchain, Web3, SaaS, AI, and custom software development, Springreen is at the forefront of digital transformation. With a mission to empower businesses, the company delivers high\\-quality, cutting\\-edge solutions to enhance efficiency and foster growth. Springreen takes pride in its talented team and collaborative environment that drives creativity and excellence to help clients succeed in a rapidly evolving digital landscape.
 



  





**Role Description** 




 This is an on\\-site internship role for a Python Trainee, located in Salem. The Python Trainee will be responsible for supporting the software development lifecycle, including writing, debugging, and optimizing Python code. Daily tasks may include assisting in developing, testing, and maintaining Python\\-based applications, collaborating with team members to design scalable solutions, and conducting research to enhance programming practices. The role offers an excellent opportunity to gain hands\\-on experience and develop skills in Python programming and software development.
 



  





**Qualifications** 



* Proficiency in Python programming, with a strong understanding of fundamental concepts and syntax
* Basic knowledge of data structures, algorithms, and object\\-oriented programming
* Experience with debugging, error\\-checking, and optimizing code
* Understanding of web development frameworks and APIs is a plus
* Strong problem\\-solving skills and attention to detail
* Ability to work effectively within a team in a collaborative environment
* Pursuing or recently completed a degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field
* Familiarity with version control tools like Git is advantageous

**Company Description: Mind Turf,** 
 established on May 19, 2022, is an online platform providing customized support through counseling and therapy services. Located in New Delhi, we offer easy access, anonymity, and the convenience of seeking help from home. Our panel of psychologists and counselors provide individual therapy, couple therapy, family therapy, and our unique Vent Out Services, catering to individuals on their personal wellness journeys.

* Proficient in
 **Flutter** 
 and
 **Dart** 
 with a solid understanding of state management techniques (e.g., Provider, River pod, etc.).
* Strong grasp of
 **Firebase services** 
 : Fire store, Authentication, Cloud Functions, Cloud Messaging, and Firebase Storage.
* Experience with
 **Node.js** 
 for
 **writing and deploying Firebase Cloud Functions** 
 .
* Deep understanding of
 **MVVM (Model\\-View\\-View\\-Model) architecture** 
 and its application in Flutter.
* Hands\\-on experience with
 **API integration, including authentication, pagination, and real\\-time data updates.**
* Solid knowledge of scalability principles for both frontend and backend systems.
* Proven experience in app optimization for performance, battery, and responsiveness.
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field is a plus.



  





**Preferred Candidate:** 
 Need someone who has developed and deployed a
 **Mobile Application on Google Play store or Apple App Store or both, using Flutter from scratch.** 




  





 You are a great fit if you:
 


* Have
 **built and shipped apps from scratch \\- and loved it.**
* You are
 **hungry to build something impactful and world\\-class.**
* Take
 **ownership without being asked \\- and bring solutions, not problems** 
 .
* Are
 **high on energy, low on ego, and never say that's not my job.**
* Want to
 **be in the room where 0\\-to\\-1 decisions happen.**
* Can
 **debug at 3 AM** 
 !
* You
 **DO NOT consider yourself as an ordinary developer.**



  





**Perks \\& Benefits:** 



* Hands\\-on experience in mobile app development with real\\-world applications.
* Mentorship from experienced developers.
* **Good salary package after the completion with company stocks options.**
* Your
 **performance can bring you to our core team.**
* Opportunity to contribute to an innovative product.
* Certificate of completion and potential full\\-time opportunities on/before completion of internship.



  





 Interested candidates can send their resume to hr@mindturf.us. Please mention "Flutter Firebase Mobile App Developer Intern Application" in the subject line.

**Company Description**
  

 AI\\-Data Value Info Com\\-Tech Alliance (ADVICTA) is a leading strategic collective specializing in Advanced AI Engineering and Enterprise Governance. By combining technical proficiency with governance expertise, we help startups, scaleups, and VC\\-backed ventures navigate the intersection of data policy, innovation, and emerging technologies. We ensure scalable and compliant AI solutions in high\\-demand sectors like FinTech, HealthTech, SaaS Governance, Cloud Computing, and Advanced AI/ML Platforms. With a focus on AI Governance, Data Value Protection, and Strategic Scaling, ADVICTA supports clients in securing proprietary AI models and managing complex regulatory landscapes to foster sustainable growth in global markets.
   

  

**Role Description**
  

 This is an on\\-site, full\\-time role based in our Gurugram office for an Agentic AI/ML Engineer. The role involves developing, implementing, and optimizing machine learning models and agentic AI systems, with a focus on natural language frameworks such as Google ADK, LangChain, and Langraph. Day\\-to\\-day responsibilities include conducting advanced research, creating scalable solutions for high\\-demand sectors, and ensuring compliance with AI governance frameworks. The ideal candidate will also work towards integrating machine learning solutions with data governance requirements and addressing algorithmic accountability challenges.
   

  

**Qualifications**
  

* Deep understanding of Pattern Recognition and Neural Networks
* Strong foundation in Computer Science principles and Algorithms
* Experience with Statistics and Data Modeling techniques
* Familiarity with Google ADK, LangChain, Langraph, and advanced AI/ML frameworks

title: Senior System Engineer (Model Based Design)
description:
Senior System engineer \\[Model Based Design]
 
 Department¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†: System Engineering

 Company Overview
 
 Takumi Motion Controls is Startup based out of Bangalore, India. Our focus in India is delivering EV Powertrain Solutions to Our Customers in Collaboration with our Japanese Peers. Upholding the Vision of
 
 ‚ÄòInnovate in India with Japanese Technology‚Äô
 
 , We are developing Vehicle Powertrain Solutions (Motor controller, vehicle controller etc.,) for Electric Vehicles that will cater to selected segments in the Indian Market. With Localized design and In House Manufacturing of Solutions we strive to enable the Small Electric Vehicle Eco System.
 



  




 Expectation from candidates
 
 We are seeking a highly driven and accountable system engineer who combines strong technical acumen with passion and determination. The ideal candidate will be analytical, solution\\-oriented, and possess excellent problem\\-solving skills, with a deep interest in building robust, high\\-quality systems. Candidates must have a solid understanding of vehicle dynamics and powertrain systems and be capable of developing high\\-fidelity models and advanced control systems for real\\-world applications.
   




 Key Responsibilities
 
 The Responsibilities include:¬†¬†
 


 Model based engineering:
 
 o¬†¬†¬†Develop high\\-fidelity model of electric vehicle systems (including multibody simulation)
 



 o¬†¬†¬†Optimize powertrain sizing and define system architecture using scientific methods
 



 o¬†¬†¬†Develop control functions for vehicle control and motor control and sensors.
 


 Vehicle system engineering:
 
 o¬†¬†¬†Prepare demo vehicles by designing and implementing key sub\\-systems such as transmission, suspension, and chassis.
 



 o¬†¬†¬†Integrate vehicle sub\\-systems‚Äîincluding cluster, BMS, controller, and charger‚Äîand perform functional evaluations.
 



 o¬†¬†¬†Conduct on\\-road tests to assess drive range, drivability, and performance across defined use cases.
 


 System requirements specification:

 o¬†¬†¬†Design system architecture along with sub\\-system teams and perform FMEA.
 



 o¬†¬†¬†Detailed test plan preparation for Integration testing and validation.
 


 System testing and analysis:
 
 o¬†¬†¬†System Integration testing on bench level and vehicle level and complete data analysis.
 



 o¬†¬†¬†Diagnostics and failure analysis using FTA, 5\\-WHY analysis.
 


 Product development
 
 o¬†¬†¬†Hands on experience on product development cycle (V model) and process (APQP)
 



 o¬†¬†¬†Develop parts by working with stakeholders and suppliers.
   




 Education and Expertise
 
 Degree or Equivalent Experience ¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†: Bachelor‚Äôs degree or Master‚Äôs degree in Mechanical engineering,
 



 or Electrical engineering
 



 Years of Experience ¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†: 5 to 7 years

title: Manager, Software Engineer ‚Äì SaaS & Data
description:
**Job Description**
**Manager, Software Engineer ‚Äì SaaS \\& Data**
**The Opportunity**
* Based in Hyderabad, join a global healthcare biopharma company and be part of a 130\\- year legacy of success backed by ethical integrity, forward momentum, and an inspiring mission to achieve new milestones in global healthcare.
* Be part of an organisation driven by digital technology and data\\-backed approaches that support a diversified portfolio of prescription medicines, vaccines, and animal health products.
* Drive innovation and execution excellence. Be a part of a team with passion for using data, analytics, and insights to drive decision\\-making, and which creates custom software, allowing us to tackle some of the world's greatest health threats.


 Our Technology Centers focus on creating a space where teams can come together to deliver business solutions that save and improve lives. An integral part of our company‚Äôs IT operating model, Tech Centers are globally distributed locations where each IT division has employees to enable our digital transformation journey and drive business outcomes. These locations, in addition to the other sites, are essential to supporting our business and strategy.
   

  

 A focused group of leaders in each Tech Center helps to ensure we can manage and improve each location, from investing in growth, success, and well\\-being of our people, to making sure colleagues from each IT division feel a sense of belonging to managing critical emergencies. And together, we must leverage the strength of our team to collaborate globally to optimize connections and share best practices across the Tech Centers.
   

  

**Role Overview**
 We are looking for an energetic, self\\-starter to join our Enterprise Information Technology team to help us identify and deliver business solutions, in partnership with Global Workplace and Enterprise Services and Information Technology colleagues. These critical functions operate at a global scale, supporting our business in over 130 countries.
   

  

 As a member of the Global Supplier Management and Workplace Services team, you will support a product portfolio that includes SaaS applications, the AWS ecosystem, Databricks, IoT, and networking. A general understanding of these technologies is expected.
   

  

**What Will You Do In This Role**
* Design, modify, and validate software systems and components by developing robust applications and clear technical documentation.
* Drive continuous improvement initiatives to enhance system functionality and the user experience.
* Develop and implement software capabilities for creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting data, ensuring solutions meet organizational objectives for security, compliance, scalability, efficiency, reliability, data fidelity, flexibility, and portability.
* Perform thorough validation and testing of applications in accordance with organizational security standards and reporting requirements.
* Support incident management, disaster recovery, and post‚Äëmortem processes to improve operational resilience.
* Prioritize tasks effectively and demonstrate a strong willingness to learn and collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to meet IT commitments and contribute to organizational goals.


**What Should You Have**
* Bachelor's degree or equivalent work experience
* Minimum of 3 years of experience working in large, complex IT development projects
* A good understanding of DB Management System and DWH and Data Lakehouse concepts is required
* Hands\\-on experience in Python or JavaScript programming is necessary.
* The candidate should be familiar with the Object\\-Oriented Programming (OOP) paradigm and able to read and should be interested in cross\\-skilling when necessary.
* Experience working with APIs is essential, specifically in programmatically interacting with API endpoints.
* Experience in SaaS application configuration and providing full lifecycle release support
* A working knowledge of AWS services such as S3, Lambda, and Glue is good to have.
* Concept of GenAI, RAG, Embedding and Vector stores is good to have.
* Knowledge of Databricks is good to have.
* Exposure to Git version control best practices and working in a collaborative development environment and DevSecOps.
* Supplier, Procurement, Facilities Management experience is preferred
* Excellent written and verbal communications and collaboration skills.


 Our technology teams operate as business partners, proposing ideas and innovative solutions that enable new organizational capabilities. We collaborate internationally to deliver services and solutions that help everyone be more productive and enable innovation.
   

  

**Who We Are**
 We are known as Merck \\& Co., Inc., Rahway, New Jersey, USA in the United States and Canada and MSD everywhere else. For more than a century, we have been inventing for life, bringing forward medicines and vaccines for many of the world's most challenging diseases. Today, our company continues to be at the forefront of research to deliver innovative health solutions and advance the prevention and treatment of diseases that threaten people and animals around the world.
   

  

**What We Look For**
 Imagine getting up in the morning for a job as important as helping to save and improve lives around the world. Here, you have that opportunity. You can put your empathy, creativity, digital mastery, or scientific genius to work in collaboration with a diverse group of colleagues who pursue and bring hope to countless people who are battling some of the most challenging diseases of our time. Our team is constantly evolving, so if you are among the intellectually curious, join us‚Äîand start making your impact today.
   

  

**\\#HYDIT2025**
**Required Skills**
 Data Engineering, Data Visualization, Data Warehousing (DW), Design Applications, Engineering Software, Enterprise Application Integration (EAI), Human Resource Management, Management Process, Project Management, Software as a Service (SaaS), Software Configurations, Software Development, Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC), Solution Architecture, System Designs, Systems Integration, Testing, Web Development
   

  

**Preferred Skills**

**Search Firm Representatives Please Read Carefully**
 Merck \\& Co., Inc., Rahway, NJ, USA, also known as Merck Sharp \\& Dohme LLC, Rahway, NJ, USA, does not accept unsolicited assistance from search firms for employment opportunities. All CVs / resumes submitted by search firms to any employee at our company without a valid written search agreement in place for this position will be deemed the sole property of our company. No fee will be paid in the event a candidate is hired by our company as a result of an agency referral where no pre\\-existing agreement is in place.
